title: 🖤 "To know how much there is to know is the beginning of learning to live." - Dorothy West
content:
Given a string str and a dictionary dict containing a list of non-empty words, add spaces in str to construct a “sentence” where each word is a valid word in dict. Return all possible sentences. You are allowed to reuse the words in dict.

Example:

str = "penpineapplepenapple" dict = ["apple", "pen", "applepen", "pine", "pineapple"] $ makeSentence(str, dict) $ [ "pen pine apple pen apple", "pen pineapple pen apple", "pen pine applepen apple" ]
